displayProperties.description:
Somewhere in the horrific depths of the Hellmouth lies the Hive Cryptoglyph. With it, Eris Morn can craft further Dreambane armor for your quest to find a way inside the Pyramid.

The Cryptoglyph is yours to take from the Hive… if you can.
displayProperties.name: In the Deep
